short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the word war with love on all websites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The "Love not War" Chrome extension replaces the word "war" with "love" in all the web pages you visit. This extension is designed to promote a more positive and peaceful online experience. Whenever you come across the word "war," it will be replaced with "love" in real-time, without any delay or interruption.

By installing this extension, you can spread positivity and promote love in your daily online interactions. This extension is perfect for those who believe in the power of love and wish to contribute to a more peaceful world. The "Love not War" extension is easy to use and can be enabled or disabled with just a single click.

This extension supports multiple languages, making it accessible to a broader audience. It also includes a feature that allows you to customize the replacement word according to your preference. You can choose to replace other words instead of "war" with "love," and the extension will automatically make the switch for you.

In summary, the "Love not War" Chrome extension is a simple yet powerful tool that replaces negative language with positive language, promoting love and peace in the online world.
